resources.string: "Madaidaiciyar tashar aiki ta Wi-Fi tana bukatar jonin datar tafi-da-gidanka, zai haifar da karin cajin kudi."
"Yayin da aka bude damar bluetooth ko yake yunkurin budewa, softap ba zai yi aiki ba, idan kana son amfani da softap, tabbatar an kashe bluetooth."
"Yayin da aka bude damar sftap ko yake yunkurin budewa, bluetooth ba zai yi aiki ba, idan kana son amfani da bluetooth, tabbatar an kashe softap."
"Ba za ka iya amfani da LTE idan wayar na yanayin amfani da a jirgin sama."
"Ba za ka iya amfani da bayanan mobayil ba idan wayar tana yanayin tafiya a jirgin sama."
